sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; // Example data array for products const products = [ { category: "Herbs", name: "Belimal Tea", price: "$4,000.00", image: "/images/belimal-tea.png", // replace with your image paths }, { category: "Spices", name: "Cinnamon Powder", price: "$4,000.00", image: "/images/cinnamon-powder.png", }, { category: "Herbs", name: "Moringa Tea", price: "$2,500.00", image: "/images/moringa-tea.png", }, { category: "Spices", name: "Black Pepper", price: "$5,000.00", image: "/images/black-pepper.png", }, ]; const Products = () => { return (

Zest Ceylon

FEATURED PRODUCTS

{products.map((product, index) => (

— {product.category}

{product.name}

{product.price}

))}
); }; export default Products;
